# https://gist.github.com/hinell/0ebaad01b771a70844204f295aaf03b7#hex-string-to-edid-binary

echo -en $(echo "\
00 ff ff ff ff ff ff 00 4d 10 87 15 a0 32 08 66\
2a 1e 01 04 b5 1e 14 78 07 ee 91 a3 54 4c 99 26\
0f 50 54 20 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01\
01 01 01 01 01 01 52 c4 60 a0 90 40 24 60 30 20\
3a 00 2f ca 10 00 00 18 52 c4 60 a0 90 40 88 66\
30 20 3a 00 2f ca 10 00 00 18 00 00 00 fd 00 1e\
78 1e c5 33 01 0a 20 20 20 20 20 20 00 00 00 fc\
00 4c 51 31 34 34 50 31 4a 58 30 31 0a 20 01 cd\
02 03 12 80 e2 00 4a e3 05 80 00 e6 06 05 01 76\
76 3e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00\
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00\
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00\
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00\
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00\
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00\
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b9\
" | sed -E 's/([0-9abcdef][0-9abcdef])[[:space:]]?/\\x\1/g') > IdealSurfaceEDID.bin
